creator: darylb@screamingmedia.com
text:
Okay, this one's kinda tricky to describe, but easy to see:

I have something which should look like the following:

"These are the items:

-  Item 1
-  Item 2
-  Item 3
-  Item 4"

The problem is, there is a page break right after my introduction line, and the 
first item is dropped, so that what I get in PDF looks like this:

"These are my items:
--------------------------------- [page break] ----------------------
- Item 2
- Item 3
- Item 4"

This may be linked to another known bug, but I can't figure out how.

creator: j3322ptm@yahoo.de
text: I can't reproduce the problem. A real testcase would have helped.

creator: gadams@apache.org
text: batch transition to closed remaining pre-FOP1.0 resolved bugs
